Sibelia
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Sibelia installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Sibelia, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Sibelia/3.0.7-foss-2020b
```
